rooms.description: Two-car garage designed with a front entrance facing the West, aligning with traditional access norms and Vastu principles for movement.
Spacious living area placed towards the East side to harness natural morning light, as per Vastu guidelines.
Adjacent to the living room for easy movement, with windows facing North-West for balanced energy.
Well-equipped kitchen with north-western alignment to promote positive energy flow and safety according to Vastu.
Located on the ground floor for easy access, designed with south-eastern orientation for relaxation and calmness as per Vastu principles.
Multipurpose room placed near the guest bedroom, ensuring privacy and functionality.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to face west, aligning with the plot orientation and allowing for a smooth flow of energy according to Vastu principles.
Large windows on the east side to invite natural light during mornings as per Vastu guidelines.
Strategically placed doorways to facilitate movement between rooms while adhering to traditional Kerala Nalukettu layout and Vastu alignments.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom, designed to face east for positive energy and tranquility.
Well-sized bedroom aligned towards the north-east, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom designed for extended family use, placed with a south-west orientation following traditional design norms.
Ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom with north-eastern alignment to ensure balanced energies as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Balconies on the first floor allow access to open spaces while maintaining privacy and aligning with traditional Kerala Nalukettu aesthetics.
Larger windows for enhanced natural light, adhering to Vastu principles of illumination in the master bedroom and adjacent rooms.
